name: AploVVare Collection
description:
The AploVVare Collection is a collection of small games from the creator of Roseblight, Project Malice, & more! Most games were created for and submitted to game jams, originally created in under 72 hours. Some games are short-term projects, created just for the hell of it. Most have been updated from the original versions to include more content for this collection.



Games Included:
  • Terato Tamer - A turn-based strategy game where you seduce monsters to survive
  • Citri Plays Noirwood - A game where you play as a vtuber playing a horror game
  • Reversary - A reverse boss battle game where you are the big guy with a big sword
  • Hellfire Pizza - A game where you deliver pizza... in HELL
  • WELD - An atmospheric game where you fuse weapons to survive the wilderness
  • ...and more!
